Name: Within
About the game: Story: In a world that has descended into chaos, only one man can restore it to its former glory... Obilis, a mercenary, has been chosen to become an Excerptus, a being that saves the world in a time of need. To fix this broken world, he recruits various allies and obtains special skills to aid him on his quest. But there are those who enjoy this ruined world and would gladly kill Obilis and all who side with him if it means keeping the world as it is. Can Obilis obtain the power to restore the world? Gameplay: - Explore multiple unique dungeons. - Play either with traditional combat or with rolling gauges, which add a real-time element to the gameplay. - Complete certain side quests to unlock special skills for your party members. - Use various skills with multiple unique effects.
